author: ajsutton
content: Digging into some Teku logs on Pyrmont and I notice that all of our nodes reported an invalid signature for what I believe was this missed block on 9 Jan: https://pyrmont.beaconcha.in/block/372481 Should have come from prysm_team. I think <@!399309815517544451> discovered some issues with a db migration gone wrong around that time so could be an artefact of that, but we've had issues with invalid signatures a fair while back because of validator duties not handling late blocks properly so thought I'd mention it in case its a sign of something bigger.

author: ajsutton
content: Unfortunately I don't have the block itself.

author: ajsutton
content: Actually quite a stream of them now that I go looking, so that lends a lot of credit to the idea that it was the bad db migration.

author: prestonvanloon
content: We had an issue with duties performed delayed, sometimes 30 seconds or longer that assigned. Then we messed up a db migration which caused a partial outage.

author: prestonvanloon
content: So it is very possible that you saw a very late block proposed from us

author: prestonvanloon
content: It was resolved on Friday though
